name: Bedlam
desc: Dark Willow's pet wisp roams around her for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.

name: Static Field
desc: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.

name: Laser
desc: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks.  Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Shadow Word
desc: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

name: Dragon Slave
desc: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

name: Dispersion
desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

name: Mana Burn
desc: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.

name: Flaming Lasso
desc: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Venomous Gale
desc: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

name: Penitence
desc: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.
